other_tests.findings: Patient reported relief from obsessive thoughts about his penis.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Symptoms improved for 3 years while on clomipramine but returned upon discontinuation.

other_tests.findings: After 12 weeks of placebo treatment, levels of anxiety and depression did not diminish.
other_tests.changes_over_time: After switching to 200mg/day of clomipramine, obsessive concerns about hair abated.

other_tests.findings: Treatment included two courses of ECT; however, the patient's condition did not improve.
other_tests.changes_over_time: After substituting clomipramine for trazodone, a remarkable remission in symptoms was observed after two weeks.

other_tests.findings: Effective for 2 months in altering delusional certainty to uncertainty.
other_tests.changes_over_time: However, overvalued concerns about her face persisted.

other_tests.findings: Patient reported dramatic improvement in overvalued concerns about facial defects after 6 weeks.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Continues to improve after 5 months of therapy.

other_tests.findings: Improved social functioning and a reduction in delusional beliefs regarding appearance.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Improvement continued during 4 months of follow-up.
